state_analysis: The initial Python script has been created successfully at /app/program.py. It currently contains the basic structure for reading from the INPUT.DAT file. However, the logic to modify the .DAT files is still missing. Next, we need to analyze the original COBOL program to replicate its functionality in Python. We will start by examining the COBOL program located at /app/src/program.cbl.
explanation: We will read the contents of the COBOL program to understand its logic and determine how to implement the same functionality in the Python script. This will enable us to modify the .DAT files correctly, ensuring that the outputs match those produced by running the COBOL program.
